apply_sql_directly.limits: Figma Make does not execute SQL against Supabase; it only generates SQL for manual apply.

run_supabase_cli.network_limits: CLI invocation is not supported from Figma Make runtime.

generate_sql_only.where_output: Generated within exported code or artifacts.

create_tables.limits: SQL generation only; manual apply required.

alter_tables.limits: Idempotent ALTER statements recommended; manual apply required.

foreign_keys_indexes.limits: SQL generation only; ensure table order and existence.

enums_views.limits: Create types/views via SQL; idempotent guards required.

rls_policies.limits: Figma Make can generate policy SQL, but cannot apply or diff live policies.

functions_triggers.limits: Generation only; SECURITY DEFINER functions must be reviewed and applied manually.

edge_functions.limits: Code generation possible; deploy via Supabase CLI/CD manually.

storage_buckets_policies.limits: Can emit SQL using storage schema helpers; must run manually.

auth_schemas.limits: Auth config is Supabase-managed; app code can target it but not reconfigure it from Figma Make.

seeding.limits: Seed SQL as separate file with idempotent inserts.

env_management.secrets_policy: Service Role must never be in client. Use environment separation and secret storage.

dry_run_and_diff.how: Emit validation.sql and checklists; external CI can compare expected vs live.

rollback_strategy.how: Provide reversible patterns and a dedicated BREAKING file for opt-in changes.

rate_limits_quotas.notes: Observe Supabase API limits; keep migrations transactional and ordered.

logs_and_diagnostics.notes: Rely on Supabase SQL editor logs, CLI output, and validation queries.
